FORBIDDEN.NO_USER_SESSION: There is no player in session
FORBIDDEN.CHANGE_ADMIN: You have to transfers your admin rights first

BAD_REQUEST.ALREADY_IN_ROOM: Player is already in a room
BAD_REQUEST.NOT_ENOUGH_MISSION: There is not enough mission in this room.
BAD_REQUEST.NOT_ENOUGH_PLAYER_MISSION: There is not enough players who posted mission (min. 2).
BAD_REQUEST.NO_PASSCODE: Some player have no passcode yet.

ALREADY_EXIST: Player with this pseudo already exists in this room

MISSION.NOT_FOUND: No mission with this id has been found for this player

BAD_NAME: Pseudo must be longer than 1 character.
